titles.title: A resolution honoring the life of Fern Holland and expressing the deepest condolences of the Senate to her family on their loss.
A resolution honoring the life of Fern Holland and expressing the deepest condolences of the Senate to her family on their loss.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Honors Fern Holland for her dedication as a human rights activist and expresses condolences to her family on her death in Iraq in March 2004.
